parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofpr

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.90

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sides

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> The Logic [[Side|side]].
<br>Side of [[Game Logic]]s and [[Modules]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''sideLogic'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Side]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[side]] _obj == [[sideLogic]]) [[then]] {
    [[hint]] "It's a logic!";
};
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Side]], [[side]], [[west]], [[east]], [[resistance]], [[civilian]], [[sideUnknown]], [[sideFriendly]], [[sideEnemy]], [[playerSide]], [[side location]], [[Side relations]]
</value></part></template>
